content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────
• Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
  – Use-case: Converts iron ore and coal into iron plates to bolster the resource pool required for lab crafting.
  
• Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
  – Use-case: Processes copper ore and coal into copper plates to resolve resource shortages needed for lab production.

(Error: Although a Lab was targeted for placement at (0.5, 2.5), all attempts to craft and place it have failed; hence no Lab structure is present on the map.)

ERROR TIPS
────────────
• get_entities Usage Errors
  – When calling get_entities, verify the supported parameters. Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or passing unexpected positional arguments.
  – Implement a fallback or null-check mechanism before iterating over the returned entities to prevent errors such as “NoneType is not iterable.”

• Lab Placement Failures
  – Confirm that the lab item exists in the inventory prior to placement. “No lab in inventory” errors indicate a need to secure the required item before trying to place a Lab.

• Lab Crafting Shortfalls
  – Ensure that all intermediate components (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available in sufficient quantity.
  – Review crafting prerequisites step-by-step so that resource shortages (or missing sub-ingredients) do not hinder Lab crafting.

(No utility functions defined by the agent have been detected in these logs.)
